kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Steam Deck' into text field 'css:input[placeholder="Co hledáte? Např. kabel AlzaPower..."]'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.msg: Sending key(s) ('ENTER',) to css:input[placeholder="Co hledáte? Např. kabel AlzaPower..."] element.
Pressing special key ENTER to element.
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
Element Should Contain
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//span[@class="AlzaText availability-alz-50 availability-alz-59 availability-alz-22 availability-alz-61"]' should have contained text 'Skladem' but its text was 'Momentálně nedostupné'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
kw.status: Element 'xpath=//span[@class="AlzaText availability-alz-50 availability-alz-59 availability-alz-22 availability-alz-61"]' should have contained text 'Skladem' but its text was 'Momentálně nedostupné'.

kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
